author: Thich Nhat Hanh
message: By living deeply in the present moment we can understand the past better and we can prepare for a better future.
title: Thought of the day

author: Ralph Emerson
message: Do not be too timid and squeamish about your reactions. All life is an experiment. The more experiments you make the better.
title: Thought of the day

author: Ralph Emerson
message: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
title: Thought of the day

author: Robert Louis Stevenson
message: There is no duty we so underrate as the duty of being happy. By being happy we sow anonymous benefits upon the world.
title: Thought of the day
